The firm has been securing profits after the US bank's shares have added more than 20% in the year to date, closing at about $41 per share on Monday.

title: Warren Buffett dumps $3B worth Bank of America shares to cash in on soaring stock price
text: Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway first invested in the bank in 2011 amid the fallout from the 2008 financial crisis.

title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Sells More BofA Shares
text: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (BRK.A,BRK.B) sold more shares of Bank of America (BAC) over the last week, extending Berkshire's pullback from one of its biggest bets after a runup in the bank's stock price.

title: Warren Buffet offloads $770 million of this stock in 4 days
text: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) has once again made headlines by significantly trimming its stake in one of its long-standing investments, Bank of America (NYSE: BAC).
